  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act​(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Shape> obstacles, double playerX, double playerY, java.awt.Shape ground)
      Detects collisions and determines velocity as well as position of ball.
      Parameters:
      obstacles - An arraylist containing bounding shapes
      playerX - X coordinate of the player
      playerY - Y coordinate of the player
      ground - Bounding shape representing the ground
      Postcondition:
      Velocity and coordinates are changed.

    • pickUp

      public void pickUp()
      The ball is picked up by player
      Postcondition:
      pickedUp field is set to true
